name: Stream
description: Creates an Amazon Kinesis stream that captures and transports data records that are emitted from data sources. For information about creating streams, see CreateStream in the Amazon Kinesis API Reference.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the Amazon Kinesis stream. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the stream name. For more information, see Name Type.

properties.name: ShardCount
properties.description: The number of shards that the stream uses. For greater provisioned throughput, increase the number of shards.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) to associate with the Amazon Kinesis stream.
